channel.title: ASF Jira
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HIVE-5488] some files are missing apache license headers
item.description:
Around 29 files that should have apache license headers are missing it in 0.12 branch. There are some more such files in trunk.
This needs to be fixed for the 0.12 release.
NO PRECOMMIT TESTS
item.summary: some files are missing apache license headers

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.

comments.comment:
List of files that should have AL header and are missing it -

hbase-handler/src/test/templates/TestHBaseNegativeCliDriver.vm

Verified both patches using - ant clean package test -Dtestcase=nothing
